document_data.name: Thargaun Crell
document_data.mainbody: '''Thargaun Crell''' was the first [[Nentyarch]] of the [[Crell Dynasty]] to rule over [[Tharos]] which would later become [[Narfell]].
document_data.Activities:
Thargaun assumed leadership of his tribe with the death of his father [[Tharos Crell|Tharos]] in {{Yearlink|-987}}. He immediately established the kingdom of Tharos in his father's honor and was the first to hold the title of Nentyarch.

In {{Yearlink|-970}}, Thargaun built the capital of [[Dun-Tharos]]. Later that year he forged the ''[[Crown of Narfell]]'' and subverted the surrounding [[Nar (ethnicity)|Nar]] kingdoms. However, it was not until {{Yearlink|-946}} when he was able to unite all of the surrounding lands into what would be named Narfell. Thargaun ruled Tharos and Narfell from -987 DR up to his death in {{Yearlink|-912}}.

Thargaun was also a devout follower of the [[demon lord]] [[Orcus]].
document_data.Relationships: Thargaun's firstborn son, [[Derevan Crell|Derevan]], would succeed him as Nentyarch.
